headline: Jim Cramer On FedEx: “We’ve Got Some Opportunity Here”
summary: FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. Cramer mentioned that there is an “opportunity” in the stock, but it is dependent on tariffs, and he remarked: “Third loser, freight transportation. Truckers can’t seem to make their numbers. The railroad stocks can’t get any momentum. FedEx showed you […]
